title: Can't leave club: Owner status, can't kick members, or transfer ownership
body:
Hi all,

Can't leave the club when I click leave club, can't transfer ownership or kick members, although i have owner status in the club.

Whenever i try any of those, an ok button just pops up with no explanation on it, but nothing I click works.  

Any idea how to fix this?

DxZeroX

replies.body: I can get that fixed up pretty quickly as soon as I know what the name of that club is!
Hm....it looks like you're not actually a member of that club anymore. All those attempts to leave the club must have finally worked.
